summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Thursday 23 December to end of Thursday 23 December GMT
description: A change in weather conditions for Thursday as a south-westerly air flow develops. This will bring relatively 'clean' air into London, initially from rural France and then later from the Atlantic. With an accompanying breeze, there should also be good dispersion of local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
